propel.core.counters

Interface ICounter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ModuloCounter, SharedModuloCounter, SharedModuloCounterLight

    public interface ICounter
    The interface of a counter

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long getMaxValue()
      Returns the maximum value of the counter
      long getMinValue()
      Returns the minimum value of the counter
      long getValue()
      Returns the counter value
      long next()
      Increments the counter and returns the next value
      void reset()
      Resets the counter to the minimum value
